title: Star Wars' Tales
description: Drawn from right across the entire Star Wars saga, this incredible bumper collection spotlights characters and situations from Episode I right through to Episode VI and beyond. This substantial volume includes a Chewbacca story gorgeously illustrated by Cary Nord (Conan), Haden Blackman's unbelievable Han Solo tale, Scott Kurtz's parody of The Breakfast Club, and the 'all-indie issue' - featuring many of the best independent comics creators in the business! Featuring incredible work by an awesome range of writers and artists and also including a bonus cover gallery - this is a book no Star Wars fan will want to miss!
author: Dave Land
